assessments.status_rationale: Today’s bullets include no report of Finland’s NBI/prosecutors announcing criminal suspicion/charges against a named vessel or crew tied to the Dec 2025 Finland–Estonia undersea cable damage. Deadline (2026-03-31) has not yet passed.

No item in today’s news indicates NATO announced a new Baltic Sea maritime operation/task force explicitly focused on protecting undersea critical infrastructure. Deadline (2026-03-31) has not yet passed.

Today’s bullets do not mention any U.S. state public utility commission opening a formal docket/rulemaking on data-center/AI-driven load growth or a new large-load tariff class. Deadline (2026-06-30) has not yet passed.
No report today of a major European bank announcing a restructuring plan with ≥7,500 net job cuts explicitly citing AI/automation/digitalization. Deadline (2026-12-31) has not yet passed.
Today’s bullets contain no coverage of the Monetary Authority of Singapore’s next scheduled 2026 H1 policy decision or whether settings were left unchanged. Deadline (2026-04-30) has not yet passed.
No evidence in today’s news that a bill was introduced in Congress to permanently make discharged/forgiven student-loan balances tax-free. Deadline (2026-06-30) has not yet passed.

Today’s bullets do not mention CMS/HHS issuing a proposed rule or formal Medicare guidance expanding/clarifying Part D coverage pathways for FDA-approved anti-obesity drugs for weight loss. Deadline (2026-12-31) has not yet passed.

While today’s news notes BYD surpassing Tesla in EV sales, it does not report a coordinated China-wide MSRP reduction of ≥5% across at least three BYD passenger-vehicle models in a single announcement. Deadline (2026-06-30) has not yet passed.

Today’s bullets discuss market themes but provide no definitive evidence that the Nasdaq Composite has already closed ≥15% below its highest close of 2026 at least once. Deadline (2026-09-30) has not yet passed.
